__e: And allow me to offer, that if punishing the enemies of my king is a crime, then it's one I'll gladly repeat.
Give me charlotte,allow me to do things my way, or a war is coming which we will both be powerless to stop.
- Good! - Anyway, gentlemen, madam, allow me to be the first to wish you bon voyage!
